attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: This app is very terrible because it laggy and it’s not my iPhone because I have an 11 pro and I have very good WiFi. And I NEVER want to vote for trump because he’s very racist and he’s the on who made corona ✌️😔

attributes.title: #DumpTrump2020
attributes.review: He’s said he was gonna do so much for us like build a wall. he hasn’t. he said he loves the lgbtq+ community. he want to take away their rights to adopt and access to health care. he’s a horrible president.

attributes.title: terrible app for a terrible president🤩🤩
attributes.review: Over 100,000 Americans dead, 25+ sexual misconduct allegations, 274 golf trips, 17,000+ tweets full of false information, thousands of protesters who protested the wrongful death of George Floyd referred to as thugs, must I go on? all of this relates back to one man. who is it?? NOT MY PRESIDENT 🤪🥰🤪🥰😋😜😊

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: This app my my phone completely glitch AND it took WEEKS to download! I had to get my phone fixed because this app glitched my phone so much even after I deleted it! Trump is the worst president ever!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app has such bad quality and horrible programming. Not only were the pages of the app stupid, ignorant, and idiotic, but it was so slow and needs to be deleted.

attributes.title: My cat is dead
attributes.review: I was enjoying this app when my cat came to cuddle with me, she payed down put her head right on my phone screen and saw the app. She started having a seizure and vomiting violently. This app killed my cat.

attributes.title: PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.review: It was a horrible app! I downloaded it to support Trump, but all it told me was to buy merchandise from him, like wigs, bleached toupees, and bright orange tanning spray with the American flag and his face on it. I’m very disappointed. I will not be associating myself with this again.

attributes.title: I hope u have insurance
attributes.review: I open this app to see complete garbage staring right back at me it wasn’t even seconds after my eyes evaporated with the wind I’m currently weighting this using my brain waves and ramen noodles.😡

attributes.title: Zero stars
attributes.review:
This app is stealing your data if you download make sure you read the policy if you accept you agree to had over all your data 

*Proceed with caution*
